``` python
with generate_app_in_tmp() as import_str:
    result = runner.invoke(_docs_app, ["generate", import_str])
    typer.echo(result.output)
    assert result.exit_code == 0

    result = runner.invoke(_docs_app, ["generate", import_str])
    typer.echo(result.output)
    assert result.exit_code == 0
```
